title: IP4 to String Conversion
description:
IP4_TO_STRING converts the IP4 address stored as DWORD in a string. The

format is 'NNN.NNN.NNN.NNN'.
name: IP4_TO_STRING

input.name: IP4
input.description: A string that contains the IP address in DWORD format.

output.name: IPAddressString
output.description: The decoded IP v4 address in string format.
